title: Was the photographer of "little Bonnie " arrested for possession of child pornography part of "Pedugat "?
subtitle: The child cartoonist was sentenced to prison for possession of child pornography, but the case is not part of a conspiracy "#PedoGate."
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A photographer of the "Little Bonnie" cartoon series was arrested on charges of child pornography, which proves that a Pedogati plot is real.
